snippet: Serena Williams has withdrawn from the season-ending WTA Finals in Singapore later this month citing a persistent shoulder injury, the world number two said on Monday....
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams has withdrawn from the season-ending WTA Finals in Singapore later this month citing a persistent shoulder injury, the world number two said on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Serena Pulls Out of WTA Finals With Injured Shoulder
headline.main: Serena Pulls Out of WTA Finals With Injured Shoulder
